sourcesContent:
import { View, Text,StyleSheet, TouchableOpacity,Image, ScrollView } from 'react-native'
import React ,{useState}from 'react'
import { useNavigation } from '@react-navigation/native';
import AddList from './AddList';



export default function Home(props) {
 const navigation= useNavigation();
 const {params}= props.route;
 const Activity = params?params.activity:undefined;
 const Description= params? params.description:undefined;
 const CurrentDate=params?params.registerDate:undefined;

 
  return (
    <View style={styles.container}>
        <View style={styles.header}>
            <Image style={{width:100,height:100}} source={require('../assets/Image/day.png')}/>
            <View style={{marginRight:50}}>
                 <Text style={{fontSize:30, fontWeight:'bold' }}>Make You Day</Text>
            </View>
             
        </View>
        <ScrollView  style={{backgroundColor:'#E6F7F6',marginTop:10,width:390,borderRadius:15}}>
           
                 <View style={{backgroundColor:'white',marginTop:10,width:390,borderRadius:15}}>
                   <View>
                        <View styles={{margninTop:50}}>
                         <Text>Activity: {JSON.stringify(Activity)}</Text>
                        </View>
                    <View styles={{margninTop:20}}>
                         <Text>Description:{"\n"} {JSON.stringify(Description)}</Text>
                    </View >
                         
                     <View styles={{margninTop:20,backgroundColor:'blue',padding:100}}>
                         <Text style={{}}>Date: {JSON.stringify(CurrentDate)}</Text> 
                     </View>

                   </View>
                   

                    <View>
                         <Image source={require('../assets/Image/add.png')}/>
                    </View>
                </View>

         

        </ScrollView>
        <View style={{backgroundColor:'white'}}>
            <TouchableOpacity style={{marginBottom:40}} onPress={()=>{navigation.navigate('Add')}}>
                <Image source={require("../assets/Image/add.png")} style={{width:50,height:50}} />
            </TouchableOpacity>
        </View>
    </View>
  )
}


const styles = StyleSheet.create({
    container: {
      flex: 1,
      backgroundColor: 'white',
      alignItems: 'center',
  
    },
    header:{
        marginTop:30,
        backgroundColor:'#7DECF3',
        height:100,
        width:400,
        borderRadius:50,
        alignItems:'center',
        flexDirection:'row',
        justifyContent:'space-between'

    }
  });
